original_text:
“It is he who made the earth by his power,
    who established the world by his wisdom,
and by his understanding stretched out the heavens.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 능력으로 땅을 지으셨고 그의 지혜로 세계를 세우셨고 그의 명철로 하늘들을 펴셨으며

sentences.original_text: who made the earth by his power
who established the world by his wisdom
and by his understanding stretched out the heavens.
